aws-cli.dynamodb: get an item: aws dynamodb get-item --table-name=$(aws dynamodb list-tables | jq ".TableNames[]" | tr -d \" | fzf) --key='{ "path": { "S": "/hello" } }'
aws-cli.logs: get events by log group: aws logs tail $(aws logs describe-log-groups | jq ".logGroups[].logGroupName" | tr -d \" | fzf) --follow

tmux.sessions: kill session by name: tmux kill-session -t $(tmux list-sessions | awk '{print $1}' | tr -d : | fzf
